metadata.synopsis: The player just dropped the complete crown controller, the item needed tocast Karsus' Compulsion and defeat the Netherbrain! Pretty important stuff. The player will make a comment and a marker will appear on the map.
metadata.how_to_trigger: get the complete crown controllerdrop it

0.speaker: Player
0.text: We challenged the gods to get those Netherstones. Hold onto them tight.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Careful. If we lose the Netherstones, we lose everything.
